Sentencas: La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.50Mn0.O-50(3) (LSCM) perovskite was studied aiming at effective anodes for direct (dry) ethanol fueled solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: Both the transport and catalytic properties of LSCM were studied in compounds with partial substitutions of either Mn or Cr by Ru (LSCM-RU).
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction data evidenced that single phase compounds were obtained at 1200 degrees C, without significant structural distortions upon Ru addition.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: Under reducing atmosphere both the exsolution of Ru nanoparticles to the surface of LSCM grains and enhanced electronic conductivity of LSCM-Ru samples were observed.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: Solid oxide single fuel cells tests showed that LSCM-Ru anodes have higher performance running on direct ethanol than on hydrogen.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: Such an increase in fuel cell performance was correlated to both the enhanced electronic transport and the catalytic properties of LSCM-Ru.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles

Sentencas: The catalytic tests revealed that Ru addition enhanced the stability of LSCM and suppressed carbon deposition under ethanol, indicating that such compound is a promising anode for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: A direct ethanol anode for solid oxide fuel cell based on a chromite-manganite with catalytic ruthenium nanoparticles
